Text.Page:
Jelena said that Samael's spies had infiltrated Cutthroat Harbor and must be killed before they could report back to him.

With the help of soldiers from the Kaia's Sword regiment, you identified Samael's justicars and eliminated them.

Samael still has justicars in Cutthroat Harbor. They cannot be allowed to report to him! I've bribed a local, {@LinkCreature:62#1010#Kasib}, to identify the operatives. It's time to track down these traitorous dogs!

Of course I have a report for you, <PCNAME>. Here's the summary. Most of Samael's spies are pretending to be sailors. You'll find full descriptions of each of them—in disguise, of course—in my report.

Did you learn the whereabouts of Samael's spies?

Great. Now it's time to get rid of them.

I've prepared a little...surprise for each of them."What do I do with it?"

Deliver it to the spies!

Don't worry. They'll think of you as someone from the Scions.

Once they open this box, it'll reveal their identities.

You take care of this {@LinkCreature:212#1037#one}, and I'll handle the others.

Even if this doesn't work, it'll be enough to slow Samael down.

You look familiar...hmm...sorry.

I heard that Justicar Bruke failed in his mission. Do you have new orders for me?
Deftly handled. With those traitors out of the way, we can now expose the true connection between the Scions of Lok and Samael.
